mapper.update:
update tmp_medicine_event
medTempId = #{medTempId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dosage = #{dosage,jdbcType=REAL},
thickness = #{thickness,jdbcType=REAL},
thicknessUnit = #{thicknessUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flow = #{flow,jdbcType=REAL},
flowUnit = #{flowUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
diluentQuant = #{diluentQuant,jdbcType=INTEGER},
durable = #{durable,jdbcType=CHAR},
startTime = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
endTime = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ended = #{ended,jdbcType=INTEGER},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createUser = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isCharged = #{isCharged,jdbcType=INTEGER},
medicineId = #{medicineId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
occurHour = #{occurHour,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
showOption = #{showOption,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isContinued = #{isContinued,jdbcType=INTEGER},
reason = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
medTakeWayId = #{medTakeWayId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
priceId = #{priceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where medEventId = #{medEventId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tmp_medicine_event set medTempId = #{medTempId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dosage = #{dosage,jdbcType=REAL}, thickness = #{thickness,jdbcType=REAL}, thicknessUnit = #{thicknessUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flow = #{flow,jdbcType=REAL}, flowUnit = #{flowUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, diluentQuant = #{diluentQuant,jdbcType=INTEGER}, durable = #{durable,jdbcType=CHAR}, startTime = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, endTime = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ended = #{ended,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createUser = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isCharged = #{isCharged,jdbcType=INTEGER}, medicineId = #{medicineId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, occurHour = #{occurHour,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, showOption = #{showOption,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isContinued = #{isContinued,jdbcType=INTEGER}, reason = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, medTakeWayId = #{medTakeWayId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, priceId = #{priceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where medEventId = #{medEventId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select t.*,(select p.firm from bas_price p where p.priceId = t.priceId) as "firm",(select mc.name from bas_medicine mc where mc.medicineId = t.medicineId) as "name", (select mc.spec from bas_medicine mc where mc.medicineId = t.medicineId) as "spec",(select mtr.reason from bas_medical_take_reason mtr where mtr.medTakeReasonId = t.reason) as "reasonName", (select mt.name from bas_medical_take_way mt where mt.medTakeWayId = t.medTakeWayId) as "medTakeWayName" from tmp_medicine_event t where t.medTempId = #{medTempId} and t.type = #{type}

SELECT a.* FROM tmp_medicine_event a where 1 = 1
AND a.medEventId = #{searchBean.id}
